snippet.title: Trombone Champ Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Trombone Champ is finally available on Nintendo Switch™! Honk, blow, & toot your way through over 50 songs! But this time, you don’t need to toot alone…Up to 4 players can play together in local multiplayer! Try the new control modes including Tilt and IR Motion Camera. Toot any way you want! Try your best to get higher scores, and compete with your friends on the online leaderboards! But even when you don’t always sound perfect, you might find yourself having just as much fun! Collect all 50 unique Tromboner Cards, meet mysterious characters, and uncover the mysteries of the Trombiverse. Do you have what it takes to become the Trombone Champ?

Available in the Nintendo eShop September 14th, 2023!
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/trombone-champ-switch/
